scripts.app-watch: forever start app.js && watch-spawn -p *.js -p datastore/*.js npm run restart-app
scripts.dev-watch: watch-spawn -p *.js -p controllers/*.js -p model/*.js -p datastore/*.js -p scripts/*.js npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build-win
scripts.lint: npm run jshint && npm run eslint
scripts.jshint: jshint --config .jshintrc app.js controllers model scripts datastore
scripts.eslint: eslint app.js controllers model scripts datastore
scripts.browserify-win: powershell -c ./globify browserify controllers/*.js model/*.js scripts/*.js -o public/scripts/grackle.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run babel && npm run uglify
scripts.build-win: npm run browserify-win && npm run babel && npm run uglify
